data.name: The Alchemist
data.detailed_description:
Play the role of an apprentice alchemist on the road in a merchant caravan. During the journey you will discover many things, including love?

The Alchemist is a gay medieval fantasy visual novel. You play as an apprentice alchemist on a journey in a merchant caravan. There, you will meet colorful characters, discover their way of seeing the world and maybe experience an intense romance... The Alchemist is a story focused game with meaningful choices. You will get caught in the middle of hostilities between two neighboring kingdoms. The choices you make will influence the outcome of the conflict as well as your future.

Features


Wordcount - 65K~ in the full game, 4.5K~ in the demo

Estimated duration - 2h30-3h/route, 9h for the overall in the full game, 25min for the demo

Endings - 15 love endings, 6 professions ending, 3 world events endings

CGs /illustrations - 18

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

movies.name: Trailer The Alchemist (Gay fantasy Visual Novel)

content_descriptors.notes: This game has censurable nsfw content (nudity and explicit sexual content). The censored version is not suitable to people under 12 according to UE laws and the uncensored version is not suitable to people under 18.
